CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks. The 'data' parameter is directly used as input for the jQuery text() function without any sanitization or encoding. If an attacker can control the 'data' parameter, they could inject malicious scripts that would be executed in the context of the victim's session.
